lines.text: What are you mental, you think this is fuckin video ?
Lead rain, Lamar. Lead fuckin rain.
Are you aware of that crosswalk on the corner?
I said take the shades off.
[Daryl does as he is told. Cop stares at him. Daryl glances over to the squad car and finds his police composit sketch hanging]
Don't let me catch you jaywalking again.

[goading him to pick up a gun]
Come on kid... maybe you'll be faster than you're brother
Now who the fuck are you man?

[grabs Marshall by the collar]
Listen, I got 10 keys of smack. It doesn't matter who the fuck I am. Who the fuck are you?
Listen to me, you little prick. Nobody fucks me over. I want my shit back tonight.
